word_mean: 内底板以上，封盖船内空间或将其分隔成层的大型板架。

sentence.Network_en: All deck fittings, windows, hatches and doors had been fastened.
sentence.Network_cn: 甲板上所有的装置、窗户、舱口盖和门都已经关牢了。

sentence.Network_en: Steamers tooted at us as sailors on deck waved in amusement.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽船向我们嘟嘟鸣笛时，甲板上的水手们饶有趣味地挥着手。

sentence.Network_en: This boat has a good deck layout making everything easy to operate.
sentence.Network_cn: 这艘船的甲板布局合理，使得所有操控都很方便。

phrase.cizu_name: not playing with a full deck

jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美， 非正式)智力上有缺陷的

jx.jx_en_mean: To fall or drop to a prone position.
&I{Sports} Waiting to take one's turn, especially as a batter in baseball.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【体育运动】} 准备下一个上场：击球员准备下一个上场的，尤指在棒球运动中

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Middle Dutch dec 'covering, roof, cloak', dekken 'to cover'. Originally denoting canvas used to make a covering (especially on a ship), the term came to mean the covering itself, later denoting a solid surface serving as roof and floor

entry.def: A deck on a vehicle such as a bus or ship is a lower or upper area of it.

example.ex: ...sitting on the top deck of the number 13 bus.
example.tran: 坐在 13 路公共汽车的顶层

example.ex: ...a luxury liner with five passenger decks.
example.tran: 有上下5层乘客舱的豪华游轮

entry.def: The deck of a ship is the top part of it that forms a floor in the open air which you can walk on.

example.ex: She stood on the deck and waved.
example.tran: 她站在甲板上挥手告别。

entry.tran: (录音机的)走带装置，匣仓;(唱机的)转盘支托面
entry.def: A tape deck or record deck is a piece of equipment on which you play tapes or records.

example.ex: I stuck a tape in the deck.
example.tran: 我把一盘磁带放进带仓里。

entry.def: A deck of cards is a complete set of playing cards.

example.ex: Matt picked up the cards and shuffled the deck.

entry.def: A deck is a flat wooden area next to a house, where people can sit and relax or eat.

example.ex: A natural timber deck leads into the main room of the home.
example.tran: 有一个天然的木制平台通到房子的客厅。

entry.def: If something is decked with pretty things, it is decorated with them.

example.ex: Villagers decked the streets with bunting...
The house was decked with flowers.

entry.def: If someone decks you, they hit you so that you fall over.

example.ex: I hear you decked him and scared the hell out of his buddies.
example.tran: 我听说你一拳把他打倒在地，吓得他那些狐朋狗友屁滚尿流。

entry.def: If someone or something is below decks, they are inside a ship in the part of it that is underneath the deck.

example.ex: The crew of the trawler were gathered below decks.
example.tran: 托网渔船上的船员被聚集到甲板下。

entry.tran: 清除障碍以准备开始新的工作（或行动）
entry.def: If you clear the decks, you get ready to start something new by finishing any work that has to be done or getting rid of any problems that are in the way.

example.ex: The hostage release could clear the decks for war.
example.tran: 人质的获释可能会为发动战争扫清障碍。

example.ex: Clear the decks before you think of taking on any more responsibilities.
example.tran: 在考虑承担更多责任之前一定要先料理完手头的事。

entry.def: If someone or something hits the deck, they fall to the ground.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various floor-like platforms built into a vessel
2. street name for a packet of illegal drugs
4. a porch that resembles the deck on a ship

auth_sentence.content: Everyone ran to the deck or to the bridge.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everyone ran to the deck or to the bridge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everyone ran to the deck or to the bridge.

auth_sentence.content: Multi-deck car parks with direct access to the stores.
auth_sentence.res_content: Multi-deck car parks with direct access to the stores.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Multi-deck car parks with direct access to the stores.

auth_sentence.content: Our Land Rover...was sheeted and lashed to the fore-deck.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our Land Rover...was sheeted and lashed to the fore-deck.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our Land Rover...was sheeted and lashed to the fore-deck.

jushi.english: Let's go up on deck and sit in the sunshine.
jushi.chinese: 我们到上面的甲板上去,坐着晒太阳吧。

jushi.english: Her stateroom is on B deck, not on the promenade deck.
jushi.chinese: 她的头等舱在B层甲板,而不在散步甲板上。

jushi.english: He decked his house on Sunday.
jushi.chinese: 他在星期天装饰他的房子。
